attr.title: The Corruption Within
attr.desc: A psychological thriller first-person point-and-click adventure game set in the Victorian era, with an emphasis on strong narrative, intriguing characters, and puzzle-solving.
attr.inst: Purchase the game at itch.io (https://cosmicvoid.itch.io/the-corruption-within), grab the Windows version (The Corruption Within Itch version.zip), extract and copy the game files into thecorruptionwithin/gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game at [itch.io](https://cosmicvoid.itch.io/the-corruption-within), grab the Windows version (*The Corruption Within Itch version.zip*), extract and copy the game files into `thecorruptionwithin/gamedata` folder.
